vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Sa.7.1;
father of: Eleazar (H0499H), Uzzah (H5798A), Ahio (H0283)
§ Abinadab = "my father is noble" or "my father is willing"
1) a man of Gibeah who sheltered the ark
2) second son of Jesse, David's older brother
3) a son of Saul, slain with him by the Philistines
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   hombre de Quiriat-jearim; (b)   hijo de Jesé; hermano de David; tribu de Judá; (c)   hijo del rey Saúl; tribu de Benjamín
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞比拿達 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "我父是尊貴的" 或 "我父願意"
1) 一名基比亞人, 約櫃曾安置於他的家中 (撒上 7:1)
2) 耶西的次子, 大衛的哥哥 (撒上 17:13)
3) 掃羅王的兒子, 為非利士所追殺 (撒上 31:2)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
亚比拿达 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "我父是尊贵的" 或 "我父愿意"
1) 一名基比亚人, 约柜曾安置于他的家中 (撒上 7:1)
2) 耶西的次子, 大卫的哥哥 (撒上 17:13)
3) 扫罗王的儿子, 为非利士所追杀 (撒上 31:2)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Benjamin living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Sa.14.49;
son of: Saul (H7586G) and Ahinoam (H0293);
brother of: Jonathan (H3083H), Malchi-shua (H4444), Merab (H4764) and Michal (H4324);
half-brother of: Ish-bosheth (H0378), Armoni (H0764) and Mephibosheth (H4648H); also called Ishvi (KJV: Ishui) at 1Sa.14.49;
Also named: yish.vi (יִשְׁוִי "Ishvi" H3440H)
§ Abinadab = "my father is noble" or "my father is willing"
1) a man of Gibeah who sheltered the ark
2) second son of Jesse, David's older brother
3) a son of Saul, slain with him by the Philistines

A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Sa.16.8;
son of: Jesse (H3448);
brother of: David (H1732), Eliab (H0446I), Shimeah (H8093), Nethanel (H5417H), Raddai (H7288), Ozem (H0684), Zeruiah (H6870), Abigail (H0026H)(?) and Elihu (H0453J)
§ Abinadab = "my father is noble" or "my father is willing"
1) a man of Gibeah who sheltered the ark
2) second son of Jesse, David's older brother
3) a son of Saul, slain with him by the Philistines

A man living at the time of United Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ki.4.11;
father of: Ben-abinadab (H1125)
§ Abinadab = "my father is noble" or "my father is willing"
1) a man of Gibeah who sheltered the ark
2) second son of Jesse, David's older brother
3) a son of Saul, slain with him by the Philistines
